title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\ResourcePolicyHourlyCycle
name: ResourcePolicyHourlyCycle
description:
Time window specified for hourly operations.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.ResourcePolicyHourlyCycle

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.duration
params.description: [Output only] Duration of the time window, automatically chosen to be smallest possible in the given scenario.

params.name: data.hours_in_cycle
params.description: Defines a schedule with units measured in hours. The value determines how many hours pass between the start of each cycle.

params.name: data.start_time
params.description: Time within the window to start the operations. It must be in format "HH:MM", where HH : [00-23] and MM : [00-00] GMT.
